name: Caves of Madness
description:
You are a mage, trying to retrieve an ancient Tome from a cursed cave that will drive you to insanity. You must quickly kill the Evil Wizard, take his key, and unlock the room to the Tome of Wisdom.  All maps are 100% randomly generated, making for a unique game loop every time you play. Good luck!

(All art, code, music, and sfx were made by CraftyClawBoom and 7SevenStudios in less than 5 days for the Snappy Gurus Game Jam)
